name: Stop N Sniff
description:
This is a weird little game that we made for the Nordic Game Jam Online 2020. The theme was "Everyday Magic" - so we thought, what's more of an everyday magic than stopping to sniff the flowers, even when things are weird?

You are a head, and you can smell the flowers in your garden. Every time you sniff a flower you collect its 'aroma'. Can you get all the aroma from the garden? Who can say, really. That's up to you.

- Controls -

WSAD to Move

ENTER to smell a flower

Mouse to Look around

ESC to Exit.
